ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The people with taqwa will be amid shade and fountains
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who take heed for themselves and fear God, will be amidst shade and springs of water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Behold, today the God-fearing will be amidst shades and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The pious ones will rest amid the shade, springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the pious are in shade and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who had Taqwa, shall be amidst shades and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely those who guard (against evil) shall be amid shades and fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Truly the godfearing shall dwell amid shades and fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those who kept their duty are amid shade and fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The righteous shall dwell amidst cool shades and fountains,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the God-fearing shall be amid shades and springs,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the Godwary will be amid shades and springs
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As to the Righteous, they shall be amidst (cool) shades and springs (of water).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Muttaqun (pious - see V. 2:2) shall be amidst shades and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, the cautious, shall live amid shades and fountains
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The righteous will be amidst shades and fountains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:41] Truly the God-fearing will be amid shades, that is, amid clusters of trees, since there is no sun therein from whose heat to seek shade, and springs, issuing forth with water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then explained the abode of the believers, saying: (Lo! those who kept their duty) those who ward off disbelief, idolatry and indecencies (are amid shade) amid the shade of trees (and fountains) plain, running water,
